response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true worth to be $800,000. However, considering the unique benefits it offers and the importance of securing such an asset, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
